subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray beat John Isner, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 7-6 (4), in Glasgow to give Britain an unassailable 3-1 lead over the United States in the first round of the Davis Cup.
snippet: Andy Murray beat John Isner, 7-6 (4), 6-3, 7-6 (4), in Glasgow to give Britain an unassailable 3-1 lead over the United States in the first round of the Davis Cup.
